info.title: octopus api
info.description:
鉴权采用Bearer Token，接口按照以下格式：

成功格式：

```json
{
    "success": true,
    "payload": {},
    "error": null
}
```

失败格式：

```json
{
    "success": false,
    "payload": null,
    "error": {
        "code": 0,
        "subcode": 0,
        "message": ""
    }
}
```
